meanings.definition: A part, number, or quantity that is left over after division.
meanings.sent1: After dividing the cookies equally, the remainders were shared among the children.
meanings.sent2: The remainders of the pizza were saved for later.
meanings.sent3: The remainders of the puzzle were scattered on the table, waiting to be completed.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed in the room, leaving behind a joyful remainder.
meanings.sent5: The remainder of the day was spent exploring the forest.

meanings.definition: Something that is left over or remaining.
meanings.sent1: The remainders of the party decorations were packed away for the next celebration.
meanings.sent2: She carefully collected the remainders of the broken vase.
meanings.sent3: The remainders of the cake disappeared quickly at the office party.
meanings.sent4: His kindness towards strangers was the remainder of his upbringing.
meanings.sent5: The remainder of the paint was used to touch up the walls.

meanings.definition: To be left after the removal, loss, destruction, etc., of all else.
meanings.sent1: The old house will remainders after the demolition.
meanings.sent2: The memories of childhood remainders in her heart forever.
meanings.sent3: The abandoned toys remainders in the attic, waiting for a new owner.
meanings.sent4: His legacy remainders as a reminder of his impact on the community.
meanings.sent5: The hope for a better future remainders in the hearts of the people.
